item.title: Fat mass changes during menopause: a meta-analysis
item.description: Ambikairajah, A., Walsh, E., Tabatabaei-Jafari, H., & Cherbuin, N. (2019). Fat mass changes during menopause: a meta-analysis. American Journal of Obstetrics & Gynecology, 221(5), 393-409.e50. doi:10.1016/j.ajog.2019.04.023
